other_tests.findings: Post-surgical imaging revealed decreased size of the ventricles, resolution of transependymal edema, and better-defined sulci due to decreased mass effect.
other_tests.changes_over_time: One year after surgery, the growth of head circumference slowed. The patient showed rapid improvement in alertness and motor skills.

other_tests.findings: MRI showed macrocephaly with marked enlargement of the lateral and third ventricles indicating hydrocephalus.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Follow-up MRI after endoscopic third ventriculostomy showed decreased size of the ventricles and resolution of transependymal edema.
